panels.description: Total CPU Usage. Stacked Trendchart. 100% means 100% overall all cores available

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(snapshot_time,$__interval),
  entity AS metric,
  cast(CASE WHEN max(val1) >= lag(max(val1)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val1) - lag(max(val1)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val1)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val1) END as decimal)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "user",
  (CASE WHEN max(val2) >= lag(max(val2)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val2) - lag(max(val2)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val2)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val2) END)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "nice",
  (CASE WHEN max(val3) >= lag(max(val3)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val3) - lag(max(val3)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val3)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val3) END)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "system",
  /*
  (CASE WHEN max(val4) >= lag(max(val4)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val4) - lag(max(val4)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val4)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val4) END)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "idle",*/
  (CASE WHEN max(val5) >= lag(max(val5)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val5) - lag(max(val5)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val5)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val5) END)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "io_wait",
  (CASE WHEN max(val6) >= lag(max(val6)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val6) - lag(max(val6)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val6)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val6) END)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "irq",
  (CASE WHEN max(val7) >= lag(max(val7)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) THEN max(val7) - lag(max(val7)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) WHEN lag(max(val7)) OVER (PARTITION BY entity ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE max(val7) END)/cast (
    CASE
      WHEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) >= lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) THEN max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7) - lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      )
      WHEN lag(max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)) OVER (
        PARTITION BY entity
        ORDER BY
          $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval)
      ) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE max(val1 + val2 + val3 + val4 + val5 + val6 + val7)
    END
  as decimal ) *100 AS "soft_irq"
FROM spg_mon_os.v_proc_stat
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) AND
  display_name = '$HostPicker' AND
  entity LIKE 'cpu'
GROUP BY 1, entity,2
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: CPU Usage Overall

panels.description:
system load averages; short->1min, mid->5min, long->15min
Red dotted line is number of cores

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(snapshot_time,$__interval),
  max(load1) AS "load short",
  max(load5) AS "load mid",
  max(load15) AS "load long"
FROM spg_mon_os.v_proc_loadavg
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) AND
  display_name = '$HostPicker'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with cpu_delta as (
select  snapshot_time as time,display_name,count(entity) as num_cores from spg_mon_os.v_proc_stat WHERE
  $__timeFilter(snapshot_time)  and entity like 'cpu_%' and display_name = '$HostPicker' GROUP BY 1, 2
)
select $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),max(num_cores) as num_cores from cpu_delta group by 1 order by 1

panels.title: Systemload

targets.rawSql:
with memTotal as (select snapshot_time, display_name, value from spg_mon_os.v_proc_meminfo where $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) and display_name = '$HostPicker' and entity = 'MemTotal'),
memFree as (select snapshot_time, display_name, value from spg_mon_os.v_proc_meminfo where $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) and display_name = '$HostPicker' and entity = 'MemFree')
select $__timeGroupAlias(t.snapshot_time,$__interval), avg((t.value - f.value) * 100 / t.value) as "ram_used"
from memTotal t
inner join memFree f on t.snapshot_time = f.snapshot_time and t.display_name = f.display_name
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(t.snapshot_time) and t.display_name = '$HostPicker'
group BY 1
ORDER BY 1

with memTotal as (select snapshot_time, display_name, value from spg_mon_os.v_proc_meminfo where $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) and display_name = '$HostPicker' and entity = 'MemTotal'),
memFree as (select snapshot_time, display_name, value from spg_mon_os.v_proc_meminfo where $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) and display_name = '$HostPicker' and entity = 'MemFree')
select $__timeGroupAlias(t.snapshot_time,$__interval), avg(t.value) as "ram_total", avg(t.value - f.value) as "ram_used"
from memTotal t
inner join memFree f on t.snapshot_time = f.snapshot_time and t.display_name = f.display_name
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(t.snapshot_time) and t.display_name = '$HostPicker'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: CPU Time Distribution per monitored Database/Instance

value.title: Show Db2 Workload Details  for ${__data.fields.Display Name}

targets.rawSql: select source_display_name  from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where host=(select host from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where source_display_name='$HostPicker') and policy_type_spec in ('DB2')

panels.title: Db2 Databases monitored on this node

panels.description: Series with only 0 or null are hidden
panels.title: AVG Db2 Database CPU Time distribution per second

panels.description: Series with only 0 or null are hidden

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(snapshot_time,$__interval,0),
  display_name||'('||member||')' AS metric,
  (CASE WHEN avg(total_cpu_time/1000) >= lag(avg(total_cpu_time/1000)) OVER (PARTITION BY display_name||'('||member||')' ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval,0)) THEN avg(total_cpu_time/1000) - lag(avg(total_cpu_time/1000)) OVER (PARTITION BY display_name||'('||member||')' ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval,0)) WHEN lag(avg(total_cpu_time/1000)) OVER (PARTITION BY display_name||'('||member||')' ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval,0)) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE avg(total_cpu_time/1000) END)/extract(epoch from min(snapshot_time) - lag(min(snapshot_time)) OVER (PARTITION BY display_name||'('||member||')' ORDER BY $__timeGroup(snapshot_time,$__interval,0))) AS "Total Cpu Time"
FROM spg_mon_db2.v_mon_get_database
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(snapshot_time) AND
  display_name IN (select source_display_name  from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where host=(select host from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where source_display_name='$HostPicker') and policy_type_spec in ('DB2'))
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

params: (select source_display_name  from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where host=(select host from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where source_display_name='$HostPicker') and policy_type_spec in ('DB2'))

panels.title: Db2 Database CPU Time distribution per second

targets.rawSql: select source_display_name  from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where host=(select host from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where source_display_name='$HostPicker') and policy_type_spec in ('SQLSERVER')

panels.title: SQL Server Instances monitored on this node

panels.description:
Shows total CPU usage of SQL Server process.
Values are collected from Event "SystemHealth" in "RING_BUFFER_SCHEDULER_MONITOR"
panels.title: AVG SQL Server Instance CPU Usage distribution

panels.description:
Shows total CPU usage of SQL Server process.
Values are collected from Event "SystemHealth" in "RING_BUFFER_SCHEDULER_MONITOR"

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sample_time,$__interval),
  display_name AS metric,
  avg(processutilization) AS "SQL Server process"
FROM spg_mon_sqlserver.ring_buffer_scheduler_monitor
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sample_time) AND
  display_name IN (select source_display_name  from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where host=(select host from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where source_display_name='$HostPicker') and policy_type_spec in ('SQLSERVER'))
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

params: (select source_display_name  from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where host=(select host from spg_mon.spgdb_source ss where source_display_name='$HostPicker') and policy_type_spec in ('SQLSERVER'))

panels.title: SQL Server Instance CPU Usage distribution

list.definition:
select display_name from spg_mon_os.v_v_display_name where bucket BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}Z' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}Z'
group by display_name
list.label: Display Name
list.name: HostPicker
list.query:
select display_name from spg_mon_os.v_v_display_name where bucket BETWEEN '${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD}Z' and '${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}Z'
group by display_name
